summary: Add support for custom metric bucket sizes in the Ruby SDK by exposing histogram bucket overrides that were made available in sdk-core.
userImpact: Users can customize histogram bucket sizes for metrics collection to better suit their monitoring requirements.
proposedFix: Expose histogram bucket overrides from sdk-core (as implemented in sdk-core PR #844) in the Ruby SDK.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented and the issue was closed.
keyQuote: Need to expose histogram bucket overrides made available in https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-core/pull/844.
